name: Power Down (Digx7)
description:
Survive as many waves as you can well having to downgrade between each one.

This game was originally made for Mini Jam 110: Sacrifice

-------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls 


WASD —----- Move

Avoid the enemies

Run into a card to choose it
